tools.name: generate-types
tools.description: Generate TypeScript types based on backend API response structure
tools.command: echo 'Use this tool to generate TypeScript types matching backend API responses. Read the worker.js file to understand API response structures, then generate corresponding TypeScript interfaces/types in the appropriate files (types.ts or specific type files).'

tools.name: check-storage-keys
tools.description: Check if all localStorage keys are using STORAGE_KEYS constants
tools.command: grep -r 'localStorage\.' src/ --include='*.ts' --include='*.tsx' -n | grep -v 'STORAGE_KEYS' || echo 'No hardcoded localStorage keys found'

tools.name: generate-permission-doc
tools.description: Generate documentation for all permissions and their roles
tools.command: echo 'Read src/config/permissions.ts and src/services/permissionService.ts to generate a comprehensive permission matrix showing which roles have access to which features.'

tools.name: find-untyped
tools.description: Find files with TypeScript 'any' type usage
tools.command: grep -r ': any' src/ --include='*.ts' --include='*.tsx' -n || echo 'No any types found'

tools.name: check-missing-tests
tools.description: Find services/components without corresponding tests
tools.command: find src/services src/components -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.tsx' | while read f; do [ ! -f "${f%.*}.test.ts" ] && [ ! -d "$(dirname $f)/__tests__" ] && echo $f; done

tools.name: generate-service-structure
tools.description: Generate a new service file with proper structure
tools.command: echo 'Generate a service file following apiService.ts patterns: imports, types, utility functions, main API functions, error handling with errorHandler.ts, logging with logger.ts'

tools.name: find-hardcoded-urls
tools.description: Find hardcoded API URLs instead of using config
tools.command: grep -r 'https://\|http://' src/ --include='*.ts' --include='*.tsx' -n | grep -v 'API_BASE_URL\|config.ts' || echo 'No hardcoded URLs found'

tools.name: check-env-vars
tools.description: Find all environment variable usage in the codebase
tools.command: grep -r 'import.meta.env' src/ --include='*.ts' --include='*.tsx' -n || echo 'No env vars found'

tools.name: analyze-imports
tools.description: Analyze import patterns and dependencies
tools.command: grep -r '^import' src/ --include='*.ts' --include='*.tsx' | sort | uniq -c | sort -rn | head -20

tools.name: find-unused-imports
tools.description: Find potentially unused imports
tools.command: npm run lint 2>&1 | grep 'unused-vars' | head -20 || echo 'No unused imports detected'

tools.name: generate-component-doc
tools.description: Generate documentation for React components
tools.command: echo 'Analyze component props, usage patterns, and generate markdown documentation with examples'

tools.name: check-voice-commands
tools.description: Verify all voice commands are registered
tools.command: echo 'Compare voice commands in src/constants.ts VOICE_COMMANDS with actual command parsing in voiceCommandParser.ts to ensure all commands are handled'

tools.name: generate-api-client-code
tools.description: Generate TypeScript API client code from backend

tools.name: find-missing-error-handling
tools.description: Find async functions without proper error handling
tools.command: grep -r 'async function\|const.*= async' src/ --include='*.ts' --include='*.tsx' -A 10 | grep -v 'try\|catch\|throw' | head -30

tools.name: check-console-logs
tools.description: Find console.log usage (should use logger instead)
tools.command: grep -r 'console\.log\|console\.error\|console\.warn' src/ --include='*.ts' --include='*.tsx' -n || echo 'No console.log found'

tools.name: generate-test-mocks
tools.description: Generate test mocks for services
tools.command: echo 'Read a service file and generate appropriate mocks for testing: mock API responses, mock localStorage, mock dependencies'

tools.name: check-type-exports
tools.description: Find types that should be exported
tools.command: echo 'Check src/types.ts and src/types/ for type definitions that are used in multiple files but not exported, or types defined inline that should be centralized'

tools.name: find-large-files
tools.description: Find large files that might need refactoring
tools.command: find src/ -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.tsx' | xargs wc -l | sort -rn | head -20

tools.name: generate-deployment-checklist
tools.description: Generate deployment checklist
tools.command: echo 'Generate deployment checklist: run tests, run typecheck, run build, check environment variables, verify API endpoints, verify PWA service worker'

tools.name: analyze-voice-features
tools.description: Analyze voice feature implementation
tools.command: echo 'Analyze voice recognition and synthesis features: browser support checks, error handling, Indonesian language support, command patterns, user feedback'

tools.name: check-pwa-compatibility
tools.description: Check PWA implementation
tools.command: echo 'Verify PWA implementation: service worker registration, manifest.json, offline support, push notifications, install prompts, caching strategies'

tools.name: generate-role-matrix
tools.description: Generate role permission matrix
tools.command: echo 'Generate a matrix showing all user roles (admin, teacher, student, parent, staff, osis, wakasek, kepsek) and their access to different features based on permissionService.ts'

tools.name: find-security-issues
tools.description: Find potential security issues
tools.command: grep -r 'eval(\|innerHTML\|dangerouslySetInnerHTML' src/ --include='*.ts' --include='*.tsx' -n || echo 'No obvious security issues found'

tools.name: check-naming-conventions
tools.description: Check for naming convention violations
tools.command: echo 'Check that constants use UPPER_SNAKE_CASE, functions use camelCase, components use PascalCase. Look for violations in the codebase.'

tools.name: generate-changelog
tools.description: Generate changelog from git commits
tools.command: git log --oneline -20 || echo 'No git history available'
